definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: I told you, before anybody take the law in his (own) hands. But now the law (is) with the police.
sentences.chinese: 過去誰都能給別人治罪，但是現在只有警察才能執法。

sentences.english: But now the law (is) with the police.
sentences.chinese: 過去誰都能給別人治罪，但是現在只有警察才能執法。

sentences.english: He's now in custody but has not been charged with a crime.
sentences.chinese: 他現在被拘留了，但是還沒有治罪。

definition: to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to sack/to remove from a position/to depose
an execution/to put sb to death
to plot a rebellion/to conspire against the state
to punish (someone)/to take disciplinary action against (someone)
to execute the whole family and confiscate their property
to execute all of sb's relatives (as punishment) (old)
